snippet: The Commerce Department said retail sales excluding automobiles, gasoline, building materials and food services, increased 0.6 percent last month.
abstract: Commerce Dept says retail sales excluding cars, gasoline, building materials and food services rose 0.6 percent in January after unrevised 0.3 drop in December 2015.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said retail sales excluding automobiles, gasoline, building materials and food services, increased 0.6 percent last month.

headline.main: Consumer Spending Gains Offset Recession Fears
